summary: The implementation successfully addresses all three requirements. Two action buttons ('Send Files' and 'Receive Files') were added to the Received tab in TransferHistory.tsx with proper navigation handlers, haptic feedback, and QR scanner modal integration. All acceptance criteria appear to be met based on the diff evidence.

hallucinated_features.description: Toast notification on QR code scan with session ID display
hallucinated_features.reason: The handleSessionScanned function includes toast.success() to show a notification when a QR code is scanned. This user feedback mechanism was not requested in the BuildRequest requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Active tab state management with useState
hallucinated_features.reason: The component introduces activeTab state management (useState<'received' | 'sent'>('received')) to track which tab is active. While the tabs themselves existed, this explicit state management for controlling tab switching was not specified in the requirements.
